full_text: Screened by NARA, 7/13/2023 DATE 2/23/88 NORMAN MARTINEZ 5914 BARTON AVE #10 LA.CA. 90038. TO:U.S. DEPARTMENT OF. JUSTICE IMMIGRATION AND NATURALIZATION SERVICE 601 S. ANDREWS AVE. FORT LAUDERDALE, FL 33301. RE: ISABEL MARTINEZ CRUZ, CASE # A90417818. SS#594-50-4113 Dear Sir (s) or Madam es). . My name is Norman Martinez, naturalization certificate # 11301592, Issued in Los Angeles, Ca on 5/14/82. This is to formally request from you the tranfer of my mother case to LOS Angeles Immigration and Naturalization Service district, due to the fact that, eversince 12/29/87, she has been li- ving with me and my family at the above mentioned address. Therefore, as she waits for her appointment for temporary residence permit I will trust that you will send said, appointment to be executed in here in Los Angeles district. I will appreciate the atten- tion you give to this matter. Respectfully. Protactive Norman Martinez. CC; NM & INSLA.
